meta.name: viewport
meta.title: Create Customizable, Hi-Def, and Scalable Backgrounds

meta.name: description
meta.content: SVG Backgrounds hosts a collection of customizable SVG-based repeating patterns and backgrounds for websites and blogs.
Create Customizable, Hi-Def, and Scalable Backgrounds

height='11'/%3E%3Crect fill='%23eeecb8' x='80' y='50' width='11' height='11'/%3E%3Crect fill='%23EEB' x='90' y='50' width='11' height='11'/%3E%3C/g%3E%3C/svg%3E"); background-attachment: fixed; background-size: cover; background-repeat: repeat; background-position: center center;

div.p: Customizable SVG patterns and background designs for websites and blogs

p.br: SVGs are small in file-size, high-definition, scalable, supported by modern browsers, and customizable. SVGs rock!

div.p:
SVGs enable full-screen hi-res visuals with a file-size near 5KB and
are well-supported by all modern browsers. What's not to love?
By Matt Lipman ✦ Bump Set Creative

input.style: background-image: none; background-color: rgb(204, 85, 119); color: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.4);
background-image: none; background-color: rgb(238, 238, 187); color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4);
background-image: none; background-color: rgb(0, 204, 255); color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4);
background-image: none; background-color: rgb(255, 255, 216); color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4);
background-image: none; background-color: rgb(202, 242, 255); color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4);
background-image: none; background-color: rgb(111, 204, 255); color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4);
background-image: none; background-color: rgb(0, 110, 180); color: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.4);
background-image: none; background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255); color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4);
background-image: none; background-color: rgb(153, 153, 153); color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4);

a.p: Subscribe to access the premium background collection

div.p: Hi, I'm Matt, the creator and maintainer of SVGBackgrounds.com. I run a web design company called Bump Set Creative in Quincy, MA. To get updates about new backgrounds, follow me on Twitter or like the SVG Backgrounds Facebook page.

Get updates about releases, as backgrounds
and features are actively in the works.
You have successfully signed up to receive SVG Backgrounds updates.
